comments.body:
This works for me.

I suggest you follow this up on the Tomcat users list.

Please do not re-open this issue unless you can provide full details of how to reproduce this issue with a clean 7.0.22 install / uninstall.

Reproduced with 7.0.22 on WinXP 32-bit.
It is a typo in 32-bit branch of code.

Fixed by r1186763 and will be in 7.0.23
I'll propose backport for 6.0 and 5.5.
Ah. I was testing on 64-bit which is why I didn't see it.

Fixed in 6.0.x and will be included in 6.0.34 onwards.

Moving to 5.5.x
Fixed in 5.5.x and will be included in 5.5.35 onwards.

description: The keys in the Windows Registry (= HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Apache Software Foundation\Tomcat\7.0\Tomcat7) are not removed after an uninstall of Tomcat 7.0.22.
summary: Windows Registry are not removed after uninstall
